name: Evil in My Dreams 2: Nightmare
description:
Find your alarm clock to escape your hellish nightmares in Evil in My Dreams 2: Nightmare!
Blast your way through hoards of enemies and collect new gear as you explore the crypts that have been haunting your dreams. Jump over acid pits (really, they kill in one hit) and kick down doors while avoiding the terrors creeping around every corner.

WASD - movement
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Kick (Enemies stunned by kick drop more loot!)
E - interact (pick up weapons, open doors the normal way)
Space - Jump
Let us know if you find all 3 weapons, thanks for playing!!

Level design by Kaycee Nienhuis

Music composed by Brett Page

Programming programmed by Luke Philipps and Brendan Smith

Spritework found by Ta-Shen Chen
